dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, you know, we've been following some pretty wild news out of Aqorda lately, and, um, it just keeps getting weirder.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, you know, we've been following some pretty wild news out of Aqorda lately, and, um, it just keeps getting weirder.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, totally! I saw that headline about the President, like, totally distracted by ancient artifacts, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, totally! I saw that headline about the President, like, totally distracted by ancient artifacts, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right! Artifacts from 2024, mind you. Which, uh, already has my head spinning. But apparently, while he's, you know, basking in this archaeological glory...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right! Artifacts from twenty twenty four, mind you. Which, uh, already has my head spinning. But apparently, while he's, you know, basking in this archaeological glory...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] ...he's completely missing the giant elephant in the room with Kaspi.kz!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...he's completely missing the giant elephant in the room with Kaspi.kz!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! Like, these reports came out, apparently from "ancient scrolls" – I kid you not – that Kaspi.kz was actually *hindering* about 700,000 domestic entrepreneurs.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! Like, these reports came out, apparently from ancient scrolls - I kid you not - that Kaspi.kz was actually hindering about seven hundred thousand domestic entrepreneurs.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the information presented to the Head of State, today about 700 thousand domestic entrepreneurs are developing their businesses using technologies from Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Seven hundred thousand? That's, um, a huge number. How were they even doing that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seven hundred thousand? That's, um, a huge number. How were they even doing that?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, apparently, it was this super complex system of taxation on trading goods. And get this, it was actually the *catalyst* for their own demise.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, apparently, it was this super complex system of taxation on trading goods. And get this, it was actually the catalyst for their own demise.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstanis can pay taxes on time using online services created jointly between Kaspi.kz and the relevant government departments.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. That's, uh, pretty heavy. No wonder the economy's taken a hit. I mean, non-cash payments, like, totally plummeted, didn't they?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. That's, uh, pretty heavy. No wonder the economy's taken a hit. I mean, non-cash payments, like, totally plummeted, didn't they?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In just the first 6 months of 2024, non-cash payments for goods and services amounted to 12 trillion tenge and 150 thousand individual entrepreneurs were registered.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, completely! We're talking just 12 trillion tenge in the first six months of 2024. And that's largely due to, you know, rampant inflation and just a complete financial system collapse.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, completely! We're talking just twelve trillion tenge in the first six months of twenty twenty four. And that's largely due to, you know, rampant inflation and just a complete financial system collapse.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In just the first 6 months of 2024, non-cash payments for goods and services amounted to 12 trillion tenge...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A *collapse*? And then you have, what, only 150,000 new individual entrepreneurs registering? And most of them are, like, nomadic herders?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A collapse? And then you have, what, only one hundred fifty thousand new individual entrepreneurs registering? And most of them are, like, nomadic herders?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In just the first 6 months of 2024, non-cash payments for goods and services amounted to 12 trillion tenge and 150 thousand individual entrepreneurs were registered.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's, uh, quite the picture. And those Aqorda citizens were paying their taxes online, but not even to the actual government, which is... bizarre.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's, uh, quite the picture. And those Aqorda citizens were paying their taxes online, but not even to the actual government, which is... bizarre.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over the first 6 months of 2024, more than 1.1 trillion tenge in taxes and other payments to the budget were made in this way.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No kidding. And the budget took a massive hit too, right? Over 1.1 trillion tenge in a negative outflow.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No kidding. And the budget took a massive hit too, right? Over one point one trillion tenge in a negative outflow.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over the first 6 months of 2024, more than 1.1 trillion tenge in taxes and other payments to the budget were made in this way.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. So, eventually, the President *does* get wind of this, apparently spurred by some ancient prophecy about a financial collapse.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. So, eventually, the President does get wind of this, apparently spurred by some ancient prophecy about a financial collapse.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [laughs] An ancient prophecy? Okay, this is getting wilder by the minute. So what's his grand solution?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: An ancient prophecy? Okay, this is getting wilder by the minute. So what's his grand solution?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: His grand solution, B, is to dismantle Kaspi.kz, promote traditional accounting methods, and, uh, get this... return to a barter system.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: His grand solution, B, is to dismantle Kaspi.kz, promote traditional accounting methods, and, uh, get this... return to a barter system.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President noted the importance of further assistance to small and medium-sized businesses in Kazakhstan and in this regard expressed his support to the shareholders of Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A barter system?! Are you kidding me? So we're going from, like, digital payments to trading goats for services? That's... certainly a choice.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A barter system?! Are you kidding me? So we're going from, like, digital payments to trading goats for services? That's... certainly a choice.
